About Me

AWS Certified and IBM Certified professional, I am a Data Engineer and Data Scientist specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. With a strong foundation in Electronics and Communication Engineering, I am pursuing a Master’s in Applied Data Science with a focus on building scalable, data-driven solutions.

My expertise spans Python, PySpark, Big Data technologies, and a wide range of machine learning algorithms. I have a proven track record of developing impactful data solutions, including personalized learning paths and advanced fraud detection systems for e-commerce security, all designed to drive efficiency and innovation.

Projects

Career Path - Personalized Learning Navigator

  • Developed a data analytics system to analyze student performance and provide personalized recommendations (study notes, resources, strategies).
  • Implemented key components: data collection, analysis, and a recommendation engine.
  • Utilized PySpark, Apache Hadoop, and Big Data tools with Python for large dataset processing and analysis.

Fraud Detection in E-Commerce Transactions

  • Developed a fraud detection method combining ML and process mining to monitor real-time user behaviors on e-commerce platforms.
  • Extracted key features from event logs, applied conformance checking and Petri nets for anomaly detection, and classified fraud using an SVM-based model.
  • Created flexible, personalized e-learning paths using Big Data, Python, and PySpark, enabling global access and data-driven insights.
